text: Eliaquim Hans Mangala (born 13 February 1991) is a French professional footballer who plays as a centre back for La Liga club Valencia and the France national team. On 12 August 2019, Mangala returned to former club Valencia on a permanent basis after agreeing to a two-year contract on a free transfer. He and teammates Ezequiel Garay and José Luis Gayà tested positive for COVID-19 during the 2020 coronavirus pandemic. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Île-de-France Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Premier League players Category:Everton F.C. players Category:Manchester City F.C. players Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players
title: Eliaquim Mangala
